snippet.title: Artists Of Fortune - Distant Worlds - Paint By Numbers - iWin
snippet.description:
The painters' group has recently been invited to compete in the Intergalactic Painting Tournament! Will they humiliate their planet or return home as champions to their loving fans?
Choose from a selection of alien puzzles and colour them in to make them come to life! Colorful pixel art space adventures are on the way! 

Features:
100 beautiful pixel artworks on five exotic planets
Lifelike pictures after painting
Handy mini-map
Filler, Blockbuster and Rainbow Crayon useful tools
Smart alphanumeric colors numeration
Smooth animations and bright special effects
Shiny rewards for extra quests
Days of relaxation and fun

Find out more here - https://tinyurl.com/y5rppstk
